phrases: Burst into bloom - Red Crown!
Surely you do not think that is sufficient to deal with me?
Why do not you show yourself already?
Silas Norman...
Unshackled
I am impressed that you realized I was the true perpetrator.
Thanks to that slip of the tongue of yours.
I am sure I do not know what you mean.
Yesterday, in the Business Area, this is what you said in trying to stop Lester.
Waiting for a chance to duel... you would never do anything cowardly like that!
So what if I did?
The only thing the media reported was that I would repulsed my attackers.
There was no report of my having dueled Sasamiya that day.
You could not have been so sure about that unless you actually saw it happen,
or else you would been told of the situation.
Either way, it could only have been the perpetrator, and those in league with him!
Well, well...
How careless of me!
So in other words, Amagiri deliberately provoked Lester yesterday?
Most likely.
He is the kind of guy who can express himself without words.
If that is the case, I see that I made the right call in targeting him instead.
He is such a hindrance when it comes to targeting you!
Why, you...!
I know, I know!
You came here just to stop me from doing that very thing, did not you?
In that case, why do not we strike a deal?
My condition is that you withdraw from the Phoenix Festa.
That is ridiculous.
All I have to do is annihilate you right here and now!
Is what you just said true, Silas?!
Lester!
Hey, I have been waiting for you, Lester.
I came rushing over when I heard that Julis had accepted my duel.
So you are the one who attacked Julis?!
He was hired by some academy or other,
to attack all the frontrunners for the Phoenix Festa.
Did not you know that?
You mean you have sold out your fellow students?
Fellow students?
You cannot be serious!
All of us here in Asterisk are mutual enemies.
We are only here to target others, and be targeted, to fulfill our own desires, remember?
That being the case, would not it be wiser to make money by taking advantage of that?
I am going to ask you before I kick the crap outta you.
Why did you make a point of summoning me here?
I am going to have you assume the role of the man behind all those attacks.
You two dueled each other, and you both fell, like the best of friends.
I would call that a likely scenario, would not you?
You go to hell!
What the...?
I get it.
So those are the comrades you are so proud of?
Please do not be absurd.
These are my precious, precious little dolls!
Puppets?
I wish you would not lump them in with something so crude.
There is absolutely nothing mechanical about them.
I see, so that is where your true talent lies, eh?
Take that!
Blast Nemea!
Lester!
Whoa, please sit tight right there.
I have raised their heat threshold just for you.
Looks like you are only capable of dirty tricks like sucker-punching.
Oh, my, you are in better shape than I thought!
No matter how many of these wooden puppets you sic on me...
No matter how many I sic on you?
Very well, as you wish...
I will be happy to take you on with 128 of these!
I like that look on your face!
Now then... farewell.
Lester!
Stop it, Silas!
Burst into bloom - Antirrhinum majus!
I must say, that is quite impressive.
But at the end of the day, you are still outnumbered!
Your skills are certainly prodigious,
but the way they conceal your own view as well is a real flaw.
I have discovered something myself!
And what would that be?
That it is Allekant that is pulling your strings.
No school is capable of mass-producing the kind of armor that can withstand our attacks...
except for Allekant!
Quite perceptive.
But I am afraid there is no way I can afford to let you go now.
I was planning to enjoy myself by inflicting pain on you a bit longer,
but I have changed my mind.
I think I will just get this over with.
What the...?
Sorry, I got held up.
Ayato!
A-Ayato...
You...
What are you doing here?!
I am here to save you, actually.
This is my problem, and it has nothing to do with you!
So why would you go out of your way to venture into danger?!
Listen, Julis.
You told me that you were fighting of your own free will - for yourself, right?
That you are protecting the kids in that orphanage
just because that is what you want to do.
Yes.
Exactly.
Well, then, who is going to protect you, Julis?
Who is... going to...?
You see, Julis...
I have been searching for it all this time.
What it is that I am capable of, what it is that I am supposed to do...
But now that I have met you here, I finally get it.
Right now, if there is something I want to do, and if I have what it takes to do it...
Well, that is what I am supposed to do.
What you are supposed to do...
I want to be there for you, Julis.
Y-You moron!
Where do you get off saying such things?!
Are you done chatting?
Mr. Ayato Amagiri?
So was that the power of the Ser Veresta?
Right.
I see it is a bit of a nuisance.
That said, although your surprise attack just now seems to have worked out,
just what do you hope to accomplish against over 100 of my dolls?
Shut up.
You are the one who is only capable of surprise attacks.
Silas Norman.
How rude of you.
In that case, would you care to test me?
With the sword inside me, I shall break out of this starry prison,
and release my savage force!
Ayato...
What the...?
I-Impossible!
I am right here.
Wh-Wh-What...?
W-Who in the world...
P-Put me down this instant!
I have no intention of hindering you!
Sorry, but could you put up with this just a little longer?
This time I am going to go all-out!
This is the essence of my Merciless Army!
Try fending them off if you can!
I see.
The most puppets you can move individually is up to six types, huh?
And there are sixteen puppets who execute a certain pattern of moves.
The rest only take the simplest of actions.
Six types, sixteen pieces...
I guess you are evoking chess?
You bastard!
I will demolish you!
I swear I will demolish you!
N-No way...
A sword that cannot be blocked, no matter what?
Impossible...
How is that possible?
Game over, Silas.
Not yet!
I have still got my secret technique!
All right, my queen!
Get rid of him!
Ripping apart the five viscera and severing the four limbs...
Amagiri Shinmei-style, Second Sword...
Nine-fanged Sword!
You sure do not know when to quit.
Sorry, Julis.
I am going to go after him, so would you mind waiting here a second?
I do not mind, but will you make it?
To be honest, I am not sure.
In that case... it is my turn, then.
Right?
I told you before...
I am not going to drag you down!
Burst into bloom - Strelitzia!
Let us go!
I will pilot you!
This time, make sure you bash that coward's face in!
Hey, that is...
not exactly what a princess would say, is it?
Checkmate...
Silas Norman!
S-Stop it...
Stop it!
Well, since Silas is a Genestella himself, I am sure this will not kill him.
And Claudia and the others should be waiting down there.
So how about we leave the rest to them?
Good idea.
It is an awesome view, huh?
I see.
It certainly is a glorious sight!
Wh-What is wrong?
Wh-What is going on here?!
Ayato!
H-Hey!
Stay with me, Ayato!
Ayato!
I am sorry, Ayato.
Big Sister?
With these circular shackles, I imprison your savage force.
B-Big Sister...
Remember what I told you before?
That I would be the one to protect you.
So...
No...
I told you that I would protect you, too.
Goodbye, Ayato.
I love you.
Oh, so you have finally come to!
Really, for a while there I did not know what to think.
I see.
So I did pass out, after all.
Do not overdo it.
I have already contacted Claudia, and they will be coming to get us soon.
Right, thanks.
N-No need to thank me!
Since you are the one who saved me.
Hey, you!
Do not move around like that!
M-My bad!
N-Never mind that, just lie still, you idiot!
Y-Yeah, but...
I-I am telling you it is all right, so it is all right!
Get that through your head!
Uh... okay.
Anyway...
That power that is restraining you...
Who was it cast by?
It was... um...
It was my sister.
She had Imprisonment Power.
The power to forcibly bind all things.
I see.
Meaning that those were your true powers, then?
Yeah...
I guess you could say that.
What is up with that?
Such a vague answer.
Well, I can only use them for so long.
This is the first time they have lasted for more than five minutes.
And to top it all off, look at the state I am left in.
Why did your sister do such a thing?
Well, I would ask her myself if I could.
As it is, she went missing five years ago.
It is all right.
I am sure that my sister had her reasons.
And I am sure there must be some kind of point to all this, as well.
Is it okay if I ask you one more question?
What is it?
Have you already decided on your tag partner for the Phoenix Festa?
Um... listen...
I wonder if I would fit the bill?
What?
I am not a man of integrity, and my mind is just average-quick,
and you will have to give me a pass on the strong will, noble spirit thing, but...
I appreciate your offer, but do not push yourself.
At the Festa level, your normal powers just will not translate.
And you would not want to end up this way after unsealing your powers after every match.
No, I am totally cool with that.
I told you before...
what I am supposed to do right now...
Julis, it is to be there for you.
N-No...
But the thing is...
These things should be handled more...
Wait, are you embarrassed?
Your face is bright red!
Idiot!
Of course I am not!
A-Anyway, d-do not look at me!
J-Julis!
Julis?
Are you serious about this?
Of course I am.
Seriously, you really are a strange one...
are not you?
What is this?
Surely you could not have been ignorant of this one's power, could you now?
Oh, man, do not tell me you actually wasted him, did you?
No worries, he is not dead.
He can still be of some use, after all.
So instead of going public with this incident and using it as a diplomatic chip,
you are going to take care of it internally, and make Allekant owe us, is that it?
I am going to leave this to the discretion of you Shadow Stars.
Please be sure to get some information out of him.
You can count on it.
It is our job.
So?
How did it go with those two?
It seems to have gone well.
Wait, you do not look too happy, considering.
Oh, really?
I would not say that.
Well, I guess it is time.
I have acquired enough data,
and they even did a better job with those bonus sneak attacks
on the frontrunners than I would dared to hope.
Ah, well, but maybe that was only because my little puppets were so competent?
At any rate, these semi-intelligent beings are so easy to handle, it is a godsend!
That is my Ayato!
Your relationship with Julis makes me somewhat jealous,
but it is for the Phoenix Festa.
I shall endure it.
Now if only our school's Rank 1...
Episode 5 - Lightning Blade Speed
if only she would agree to compete...
